div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 271px;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 220px; margin-left: 516px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Determine the randomness of Math.random in Java

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 60px; margin-left: 371px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.span: Create a java program that can either input 0 or 1, both having a 50/50 chance

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 461px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Analyse the amount of 0s and 1s gotten to determine the chance

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 316px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Represent this value as a percentage

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 620px; margin-left: 481px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Calculate the max amount of rows of a single number (either 1 or 0) the user has gotten

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 620px; margin-left: 61px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Calculate the luck of the user

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 730px; margin-left: 161px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Give the user "points" based on their luck.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 762px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 860px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: These points can be converted to in-game money. 10 points = $1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 870px; margin-left: 171px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: All of this data has to be stored to a text file

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 860px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: This program would also have a login system

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 860px; margin-left: 461px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: The user would have to input a username and password to access their account

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1000px; margin-left: 86px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Directory Structure:
Users/[username]/password.txt
Users/[username]/gamedata
Users/[username]/gamedata/points.txt || money.txt

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 750px; margin-left: 371px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: There should be a leaderboard system.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1000px; margin-left: 381px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #393C56; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Create an account/ Log into an existing account || Create an account; if the user enters in wrong info for the log in thing, they should get an error message. Same applies for the password. Implement encryption for the password if possible.
